This can globally impact and can uplift the life for millions. The end goal is to have a ServiceNow-powered platform where individuals or organizations can register as:

  • Learners (seeking skills like coding, language, vocational training)
  • Trainers/Volunteers (who can offer free or low-cost sessions)
  • Sponsors (providing resources like devices, internet access)
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Millions of people struggle with skill development opportunities, especially those from underprivileged backgrounds. Without proper training, they struggle to find jobs and improve their living conditions. The goal is to have a centralized platform that connects skilled volunteers, trainers, learning resources and learners in need.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

The platform will:

  • Use ServiceNow Portal for easy registration and matching.
  • Automate tasks to connect learners with trainers based on skill needs and availability through Flow designer and other automation ways.
  • Include catalog items for requesting resources (e.g., laptops, books).
  • Enable NGO and corporate CSR collaboration for funding and outreach.
  • Integration Hub for connecting with external learning platforms (Coursera, LinkedIn Learning)

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

No technical dependencies highlighted for this solution

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

There could be challenges with managing resource distribution fairly and spreading awareness related to this.
